stories.headline: Welcome to the new Hinckley Homeless Website!
text: Welcome to the new Hinckley Homeless Group website!
This fantastic website (better than that Google thing) was developed by the fantastic Tom Clarke as a voluntary project (he is just that nice).
If Google are reading this, I am joking and please give me a job.
